actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to increase supplemental security income benefits to $200 a month for individuals and $275 a month for couples.

summary.text: Increases supplemental security income benefits to $200 a month for individuals and $275 a month for couples, under title XVI of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to increase supplemental security income benefits to $200 a month for individuals and $275 a month for couples.
